definition: an adornment consisting of a strip of a contrasting color or material, mark with stripes
details:
noun
- an adornment consisting of a strip of a contrasting color or material
= synonyms: band
- a narrow marking of a different color or texture from the background
= example: a narrow marking of a different color or texture from the background
= synonyms: bar
- a kind or category
= example: a kind or category
- V-shaped sleeve badge indicating military rank and service
= example: V-shaped sleeve badge indicating military rank and service
= synonyms: chevron, stripes, grade insignia
- a piece of braid, usually on the sleeve, indicating military rank or length of service
verb
- mark with stripes
